Label.text: The total value #totalValue# of the order is greater than the maximum value #maxValue# of the Order template.
The total value #totalValue# of the Order is lesser than the minimum value #minValue# of the Order template.
The product(s) #summary# has/have been assigned more than once using the same item template.
The Order date must be lesser than or equal to delivery date.
Please choose a delivery date during the next #days# days.
Choose a delivery date that is at least #days# workdays in the future.
The selected delivery date is a Saturday. Delivery is not allowed on Saturdays.
The selected delivery date is a Sunday. Delivery is not allowed on Sundays.
The selected delivery date is not a workday.
Please assign a wholesaler.
Please assign a delivery recipient.
The quota for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s). Please reduce the quantity for this product.
The quota for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s).
The user inventory for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s). Please reduce the quantity for this product.
The user inventory for product #productName# is overdrawn by #quantity# #unit#(s).
The quota for some products are overdrawn: #summary#. Please reduce the quantity for the products.
The quota for some products are overdrawn: #summary#.
The user inventory for some products are overdrawn: #summary#. Please reduce the quantity for the products.
The user inventory for some products are overdrawn: #summary#.
Please fill in all values.
The entered quantity #quantity# of #item# exceeds the defined max quantity #maxQuantity#.
Ordered quantity is more than the allowed quantity for the product #summary#.
Calculation Schema could not be determined.
Calculation failed - No condition found for mandatory calculation step #step# and product #product#.
The product(s) #summary# has/have beed modified, please provide the reason for the modification.
Please enter the delivery date.
Please confirm payment collected.
For collecting the order payment, a payment method needs to be specified.
You don't have the required permission to use the penny perfect pricing feature. Contact your salesforce administrator.
Partial payment can't be accepted for this order or document. Make sure you collect the total amount.
